bio:
Einvard is a student at the Bards College in Solitude, the provincial capital of Skyrim. He is a young Nord man.
Quotes:
If asked about himself: "Solitude is where I call home now. I am learning my trade at the Bards College. Pretty fancy, huh? My family's in Falkreath though. I like to travel there as much as I can. Folks there could use some good cheers every now and then, what with that cemetery they all live right next to."
If asked his thoughts about Solitude: "With all these guardsmen in fancy Imperial armor and walls as tall as giants, I think to myself everyday, this has got to be the safest place in all of Skyrim. Of course, then I remember that we're all standing on this pillar of rocks and there's nothing between us and the depths of the sea. And that's enough to tremble a grown man's heart. I am not good with high places.
name: Einvard the Pathfinder
notes: Custom voiced, feel free to change the assigned voice model
